controlled_vocabulary.comment: Information required in the Array Measurement Table, used to describe the manipulation of the raw data"
The elements of this controlled vocabulary are encoded in the curation tool. They regulate the 'equation' box.

term.name: user_defined_symbolic
term.description: is explicitly written by the data provider

term.name: background_correction_method
term.description: the method used for subtracting the background from the raw data

term.name: proprietary
term.description: an unreleased algorithm such as used by Affymetrix

term.name: genex_predefined
term.description: is an equation explicitly supported by NCGR

term.name: user_defined_free_text
term.description: is explicitly written by the data provider
